title: Beautiful collection of artefacts
text:
We reached the museus by taxi, but I believe it will be easy to get there by bus or bicycle.
We left the shoes at the entry and there is a free entry and another fee for pictures.
Beautiful collection inside and staff and very informative.
Beware you will need to climb stairs.
There is a small shop inside with souvenires.
Taxis used to be park outside to take you back. Taxi drivers will try to get you to some shops, they get a commission from the sales of this shops.

title: Scenic view surrounded by ginormous monuments
text:
It’s a must visit if you are in Athens. It was not in our plans initially but it was worth the 20€ we pay at entry per person.
You step into a another world. Impressive and ginormous. So many temples together in same place with beautiful scenic views from the new and old city.
Although did not allow access to Dyonisios Theatre it gave us a beautiful view from the top/back of it.
Take good grippy shoes and sun protection if you go in Summer. People with poor mobility might struggle there due to the amount of steps and uneven floor.
They don’t allow food to go in. There is fountain with drinkable water inside and toilets as well.

title: Free wee castle
text: Unplanned visit in sunny day. We traveled by car, the road is very narrow but the landscape is beautiful. No car park (off-road parking). No entry fee. Perfect for a picnic day on the back of the castle facing the river Tyne.

title: Amazing infinity pool with fantastic view
text: I booked 2 nights as we wanted to fishing our 2 weeks in Kerala feeling relaxed. This was my best decision. The hotel is very pretty, the view from the infinity pool is amazing with hot water in chilly sunset. The breakfast had a good selection of Indian and European food. The staff was always polite and friendly. We tried the spa for massage which I definitely recommend. Thank you for having us

title: Yummy food
text: Good food. The service was excellent and very quick. We ordered a share platter for 2 and 2 more side dishes and found it noting expensive.

title: A must go restaurant
text: Been there with friends and family. Amazing food and good wine selection , waitress recommendations. You need to try 'Caldeirada de tamboril' yummy!!!! Friendly staff, and if you need information about unexplored Algarve just asked them. Mandatory stop for our next trip to Portugal.
